mapper.insert: insert into point_score (point_score_id, course_id, student_no, second_requirement_id, point_score) values (#{pointScoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pointScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
